projects.title: BuyNow
projects.description: An e-commerce web app, having seamless shopping experience with add to cart, easy navigation and payments feature.Login and Signup for user and fresh users. Tech Used: React.js, Redux, SCSS, Firebase.

projects.title: Monsoonmate
projects.description: Developed a dynamic weather app featuring real-time weather data using weather API. Providing users with accurate weather information for selected locations. Tech used: Frontend: React.js, Material-UI. API Integration: OpenWeatherMap.

projects.title: Task Tracker- TODO
projects.description: Feature of task creation, editing, and deletion capabilities. Added motivational messages upon task completion for user engagement. Utilized React Hooks for state management. Tech used: Frontend: React.js, CSS. Local Storage: Web Storage API
